Unique property for sale in Huay Yai . A large 2,224sqm property for sale with a 4-bedroom house and 3 separate guest accommodations totaling 7 bedrooms and 6 bathrooms. This property comes fully furnished and sat on two separate chanotes, one for the access driveway and one for the house and land. Magnificently cared for lawns and gardens surround this house and private pool in this very private location. The owner built designed the house to European standards so extending the size of the house is possible. If you love nature and fresh living, you will love this house, fruit trees along all borders, fishpond with large Koi and some edible fish so you can fish for your dinner. Large private pool, with natural cleaning system so no chemicals or chlorine, large lawn expanses, secluded driveway, plenty of parking and all that is just the outside of this breathtaking property. The current owner is a craftsman, so most of the furniture and decorations have been hand crafted, painting, cupboard doors, furniture, its truly something to behold. Inside there are 7 Bedrooms in total. There is a guest wooden country style house 1 bedroom on site (about 25sqm) with shower and toilet and summer kitchen outside. On the top of the roof of the main house also they also have a guest house and office with separate entrance, bed, kitchen, shower, toilet, bedroom (around 30 square meters). There are 4 Bathrooms in the house and every guest house have bathrooms aswell, there is also a shower and toilet near the swimming pool. The Main House is nearly 260 square meters. Full living space with 2 guest houses is 315sqm. There is a fishpond, with clear water from underground water source, the pond does not dry up all year round. There are 6 different kinds of fishes on the pond, you can fish and eat some of the fish. The house has its own underground well with clear water. There is a large private swimming pool, with ecological system of cleaning, without any chlorine or other chemicals, clear water. There are fruit trees on site including bananas, very big and sweet mangos, jackfruits, papaya and coconuts. All areas have a video security and alarm system. A beautiful, illuminated bamboo alley leads to the house (it has its own chanote). Last but not least there is super speedy internet provided to the house. Contact a member of Gecko Properties helpful team to you learn more about this excellent Thailand Property for sale and the surrounding area GKP-H009364.

titles.title: House in Manee Ville East Pattaya H009374

descriptions.description: Special Promotion, pay a deposit before the end of July 2021 and receive free aircon (5 aircon units) throughout the house! Look down over the trees till infinity. The second floor has a glass room for relax and enjoy the view. Next to it is a balcony to enjoy the view, the nice weather and the wind straight from the ocean. This lovely house is on a plot of 189 wah (756 square meter) and there is still an option to make it 398 wah (1592) square meter). It is at the end of a dead-end road. No traffic next to the house. The house has 192 sqm living space and a 60 sqm roofed parking. There are 3 master bedrooms. 1 Master bedroom down stairs with a big bathroom with jacuzzi bath. Upstairs a master bedroom with a walk inn closet and a master bedroom with a great view and a 12 sqm balcony. On the second floor is one room planned as a game/living room with access to the glass view room. If needed, this can also be a 4th bedroom. There are 4 bathrooms, a big living with open kitchen and eating space. A roofed terrace of 8 x 3 meter and a roofed parking of 10 x 6 meter for 4 cars. There is also a separate store room of 26 sqm for tools and garden stuff or even be turned into a maids quarter. The house is made on piling, which is stronger than footing and has double outside walls for noise reduction and energy saving. On top of this they finished the outside wall with conwood. It is concrete that looks like wood to get more isolation and to make it beautiful and give it a Thai style feeling. The location is good and surrounded by other luxurious houses. In only 15 to 20 minutes you can be by Pattaya Central Road. Road 36 and highway 7 are not too far away, but far enough to enjoy the silence and the birds. Close to International Schools and easy access to the highway, the airport and Bangkok. There is a lot of garden left, big enough for good size swimming pool if wanted. The builder can make this for an extra price depending on the wishes for the pool. The garden design is up to the buyer. If the buyer want they can buy an extra plot of 209 wah next to this plot to make an even more fantastic estate. Contact a member of Gecko Properties helpful team to you learn more about this excellent Thailand Property for sale and the surrounding area GKP-H009374.

titles.title: 8 Bedrooms House in The Vineyard Phase I East Pattaya H009655

descriptions.description: MAIN HOUSE AREA Protected Main Entrance with water features. Foyer and open large Living and Dining area with a sophisticated, casual elegance. Panoramic sliding doors and stunning views to the garden. Top of the line B&O sound system. Well-equipped spacious Kitchen with Siemens appliances and 3 large wine cabinets. A nice hallway leads to Master Bedroom with en-suite bathroom and a 20 m2 walk-in closet. Direct access to the beautiful terrace lounge and pool. In the same area is Bedroom 2 with en-suite bathroom and direct access to the garden. You can also find: Guest Toilet, Storage Room and Electrical Room here. The gorgeous overflow Pool 19 m long and 8 m wide is salt - chlorinated with a 14 m2 Jacuzzi corner. Small sundeck inside the pool with sun deck chairs. Terrace Lounge with a large and comfortable sitting area, marble bar with refrigerator, remote controlled sun awnings. Guest Toilet. Charming Garden Sala with dining area for 10 people. Barbecue with a practical storage and refrigerator. GYM HOUSE, SUN DECK & TROPICAL OUTDOOR SHOWER Professional Gym with seven Life Fitness machines. Bathroom. B&O sound system. Panoramic sliding doors on three sides overlooking the beautiful garden. The perfect place to do your morning exercise. Can also be transformed to a bedroom if needed. Sun Deck outside the gym with sundeck chairs and a remote controlled sun awning. The Tropical Outdoor Shower is well hidden in the exotic garden next to the sundeck. GARDEN The tropical garden is impeccable maintained. Several hundreds of plants and trees have been added to the already existing garden. Waterfall and water features have been improved to suit the new garden planning. The purling water and an abundance of garden lights make the outdoor pool terraces and Garden Sala favorite places to spend the evenings in your own private paradise. CONNECTING HOUSE Large Office / Library with en - suite bathroom. Direct access to the garden. Can also be used as an extra Guest Bedroom 3. Peaceful Buddha & Meditation room. Bedrooms no. 4 and no. 5 have two single beds in each room and bathrooms ensuite and are situated in the corridor connected to the Main House. GUEST HOUSE The comfortable Bedroom 6 is situated in a separate house in a quiet corner of the garden overlooking the pool area. EXTRA BASIC APARTMENT On second floor above the garage Bedrooms no 7 and no 8 with two twin beds in each room.Bathroom. Relax room with TV. STAFF AREA Bedroom with double bed. Bathroom.Well equipped Kitchen with Siemens appliances. TV.Terrace & Laundry Area. Barbecue.Separate entrance via garage. POOL HOUSE Newly upgraded state of the art equipment with double sand filters and in connection also professional filters for Government household water.As an extra reserve there are 4 x 400 l day tanks for Government water. Private well with water used for garden´s automatic irrigation system. GARAGE Parking for one car and motor bikes. Storage shelves. Remote controlled shutter. GENERATOR HOUSE Dedicated and insulated house with a 55 kVA generator. Fuel tank 500 l. With a fully loaded fuel tank the capacity to supply electricity for the whole property is 50 + hours. So no worries if electrical cuts should occur. LOCATION The property is situated in a small and peaceful gated community near the well known Siam Golf & Country Club north east of Pattaya. It has a quick access to Highway 7/36 and it is only a 10 - 15 minutes’ drive to Bangkok Hospital Pattaya.Both Regents International School and Tara Pattana International School are within easy reach. The small village nearby offers small shops and eateries, food markets and of course you will also find the local temple there. The nearest beach is Pattaya Beach 14 km away and less than a 20 minutes drive. Jomtien Beach is 19 km away and can be reached in less than half an hour and Bang Saray Beach in 35 minutes. MORE DETAILS The property is situated in a small and peaceful gated community near the well known Siam Golf & Country Club north east of Pattaya. It has a quick access to Highway 7/36 and it is only a 10 - 15 minutes drive to Bangkok Hospital Pattaya. Management Company The small community is served by a management company who takes care of the security service, garden and pool maintenance as well as garbage collecting. The above mentioned services are included in the monthly management fee. Repair work can also be managed by the company. The property has a separate entrance for service staff. Security ServiceThe community has a 24 hrs security service CCTVThe property has in total 8 exterior cameras installed, 3 in entrances and 4 in the garden. All buildings have dedicated alarm with key pads. Video door phone / intercom in main entrance and staff entrance. High speed Wifi( 200 MB ) that covers the whole plot. Air Conditionin total 16 units. Ceiling FansTwo ceiling fans in Terrace Lounge and one in Garden Sala. TVinstalled in TV corner Living Room, Kitchen, Master Bedroom, Bedroom 2, Staff Kitchen, Relax Room Extra Apartment. B&O Sound SystemTop of the line installation in the Living Room Area and in the Gym. Curtains & RollersHigh quality curtains in all Bedrooms. Electrical rollers ( Somfy ) in Living Area. Safeinstalled in Master Bedroom, Bedroom 2, Guest House and Office & Library. Lighting A total of 343 lamps make the property look stunning at night. 240 Interior Spotlights 6 Interior Pendant lamps, 39 Exterior wall lamps, 58 Exterior Garden lights. GeneratorSeamless transfer if there is a power cut in the neighborhood. The generator will start immediately by itself and run as long as there is no electrical power. When the power comes back it will seamlessly stop the generator andconnect to the Government electricity. The capacity of the generator is more than enough to run the whole electrical system including all air conditions, the exterior garden lights and of course the internet for approximately 50 hrs. Please contact a member of Gecko Properties helpful team to learn more about this excellent Thailand Property for sale and the surrounding area - H009655.

One expense the owner does have, is that he rents the large plot of land from the owner on a long term lease for 3000 thb per year. titles.title: 2 Bedrooms Condo in Northpoint Wongamat C009645

descriptions.description: Do you want to own the Ultimate Penthouse Condo in Pattaya? Then look no further than this 390 sq/m 2 bedroom 4 bathroom condo with a private pool in Building A of Northpoint, Wongamat. This two bedroom, four bathroom duplex condo offers luxurious exclusive living on the 51st floor of Northpoint Condominium. The moment you walk into the property you are met with the stunning panoramic sea and Koh Larn Island views. On the 1st floor you have a beautiful open planned living area with floor to ceiling windows. Opening the electric blinds and the views are simply stunning and out of this world. A fully loaded European kitchen with Siemens built in ovens, stove, washing machine, dryer and dishwasher. Along the hallway is a guest bathroom with Bisazza tiles and decoration and Excelsior Toto Hansgrohe sanitary ware. The master bedroom again offers floor to ceiling windows with 180 degree views over ocean, Pattaya City and beyond. The en-suite bathroom really is something to die for, an elegant free standing bath tub with views over the city, a rainfall shower and plenty of built in wardrobe space. The second bedroom follows the theme of floor to ceiling windows with ocean views and a spacious en-suite bathroom. Going back to the condo entrance is an glass balustraded staircase leading to the 2nd floor. On the 2nd floor is a second living room/entertainment area with spectacular views and a bar/kitchen with built in Gaggenau champagne cooler. Huge balcony doors then lead out to the private 3m x 11m infinity swimming pool with Bisazza tiles, again offering these spectacular views. A huge terrace area wrapping around the swimming pool so you can enjoy then hot days and cools nights entertaining your family and friends overlooking Pattaya City. Northpoint is located directly on the beach in the luxurious area of Wongamat Beach, Pattaya and offers 5 star facilities including beach front swimming pool, 29th floor fitness centre, several sky pools and lounges, tennis courts and a multi storey car park and 24hr security. Please contact a member of Gecko Properties helpful team to learn more about this excellent unique Thailand Property for sale and the surrounding area - C009645.

titles.title: 10 Bedrooms House in Siam Royal View East Pattaya H009559

descriptions.description: Impressive home for sale in Siam Royal View. This amazing home for sale offers a spectacular 10 bedroom 12 bathroom, infinity pool and huge rooftop terrace with sea views, all over 1,200 sq/m of living space plus an extra 600sq/m rooftop terrace on 1,256 sq/m of land. You will instantly be impressed as you drive through the electric gates and up the long drive leading to a oversized four-car garage. To your right are lush green lawns and gardens and an infinity pool with sun loungers calling out your name. As you enter the property you are met by a very high-class finish and top end quality furnishings that this property offers. A fully loaded huge European kitchen with Bosch appliances including a teppanyaki plate, a real coffee machine and even a professional meat slicer for your italian cold cuts. With loads of counter space and cabinets that would only fit a house like this overlooks the spacious living and dining area that seats 12. An elegant glass walled wine cellar to show off your impressive wine collection adds the finishing touch to this living area. Through the 2.8m high balcony doors is the terrace area, pool and sala that all offer panoramic views of Pattaya City, the sea and Koh Larn Island. Also on this first floor with direct access to the terrace and swimming pool is the master bedroom with en-suite complete with the top of the range fittings with dual wash basins including tv fitted into the mirrors, a large bathtub and a shower/steam room. The master bedroom also has a spacious walk-in closet with secure safe. Several guest bedrooms are located toward the back of the home ensuring privacy and comfort. All of the guest bedrooms are en-suite with large showers and Japanese toilets. The bedrooms offer plenty of room and have been beautifully furnished including electric curtains and blinds Off the living area is a private elevator taking you to the ground floor. There you will find access to the garage, storeroom and garden area. On the ground floor you will also find a 120 sq/m fully fitted gymnasium that would be the envy of most fitness centres. There is a shower and sauna adjoining to gymnasium to relax in after that hard workout. No home like this is complete without a professional office and another en-suite. There is a beautiful guest area on this floor that has its own kitchen and lounge offering complete privacy for guests/relations. If you make your way outside to the back of the home you will find a Thai style kitchen and 3 more en-suite bedrooms for even more guests. Time to head back upstairs and onto the rooftop terrace complete with Astro turf offering a staggering 600 sq/m of area to party, relax or simply sit back and soak up the sun and the stunning 270-degree views of Pattaya and the surrounding area. Finally, the home comes complete with a back up generator should you ever lose power. The village in Pattaya has a very private feel although there is still very much a strong community spirit within the village. As such, the communal facilities are somewhat limited, the village does have a communal pool and garden with 24-hour manned security with CCTV throughout the village. Contact a member of Gecko Properties helpful team to you learn more about this excellent Thailand Property for sale and the surrounding area GKP-H009559.

There is also a huge walk in wardrobe and en-suite with bathtub. The second bedroom is very spacious and again has wall to ceiling windows and another balcony offering spectacular views over cozy beach. With a smart tv, plenty of wardrobe space and a sofa this would make a great guest bedroom for when friends of family come to visit you. titles.title: 1 Bedroom bed in Condo in Northshore in North Pattaya C009000

descriptions.description: Newly renovated condo for sale in the prestigious Northshore complex, North Pattaya.A newly renovated 1 bedroom condo at Northshore. It is the '06' large 79 sqm unit on the cooler north side of the building. It is on floor 19 and is available in Thai or can be transferred into a Company name. The condo has undergone a complete, high-quality renovation. The owners got rid of all the dated, dark wood--kitchen cabinets, doors, moldings, armoires, and vanity. The result is a fresh, clean look very different from any other Northshore condo. Starting with the kitchen, it now has high-gloss cream cabinets with extra drawers added. New Siemens 3-burner induction cooktop, exhaust hood, and microwave. New sink and faucet. New high quality granite counters and under counter lighting. New 3-compartment large Mitsubishi refrigerator with automatic ice maker. The refrigerator is housed in a new custom cabinet with luggage storage overhead and a large side cabinet. The lower part of the side cabinet has 4 large shelves for shoes and the spacious, lighted upper cabinet has ample storage for linens or other storage. Adjacent to the dining area is a large, new custom desk with upper cabinet and under-cabinet lighting. The desk has a pull-out printer shelf and concealed electrical outlets and wire management. The desktop granite matches that of the kitchen. This workspace would be ideal for anyone working from home. Dividing the dining and living room spaces are custom wood floor-to-ceiling partition panels to give some visual separation to the large space. The living room has a new LG 65-inch television with LG sound bar and new remote controlled ceiling fan. In the large dressing room alcove, the old, dark armoires were removed and new custom armoires in high-gloss cream were installed. Lots of lighted cabinet and drawer storage. The side armoire has more clothes storage and a hidden safe. The bathroom has a new high-gloss vanity with drawer storage, new, large custom matching vanity mirror with concealed upper and lower lighting. Above the toilet, the old, dark doors were replaced with new cream doors for the storage cabinet. New exhaust fan and towel bars. The bedroom has a new, custom book shelf cabinet with hidden electrical and wire management for the wall-mounted new LG 55-inch television. New king bed and Sealy mattress. Moving to the balcony, there is a new custom cabinet with granite top that houses a large capacity clothes dryer. Above the cabinet are two matching shelves and a new electrical outlet. In the balcony storage area by the aircon compressor is a new Samsung washing machine. The large balcony has a new dining set with marble table and two lounge chairs. New energy efficient ceiling lighting was installed throughout the condo. All the rooms have new wallpaper, new rugs, and re-worked window treatments. All the furniture is new. The custom cabinets all have soft-close doors and drawers. The condo comes fully-furnished. Everything conveys except the artwork, accessories, and the antique chests and stools. Contact a member of Gecko Properties helpful team to you learn more about this excellent Thailand Property for sale and the surrounding area GKP-C009000.
